sentence.Network_en: There has been a busy start to polling in today's local elections.

sentence.Network_en: The ward was busy and Amy hardly had time to talk.
sentence.Network_cn: 病房里非常忙碌，埃米几乎没有时间说话。

sentence.Network_en: I had a busy day and was rather tired.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bisgian (verb), bisig (noun); related to Dutch bezig, of unknown origin

entry.def: When you are busy, you are working hard or concentrating on a task, so that you are not free to do anything else.

example.ex: They are busy preparing for a hectic day's  activity on Saturday...
example.tran: 他们正忙着准备周六一整天都安排满了的活动。

entry.def: A busy time is a period of time during which you have a lot of things to do.

example.ex: It'll have to wait. This is our busiest time ...
example.tran: 这事得往后放。这是我们最忙碌的时候。

example.ex: Even with her busy schedule she finds time to watch TV...
example.tran: 即使日程安排很满，她也要抽出时间看电视。

entry.tran: 全神贯注的；心无旁骛的；埋头于…的
entry.def: If you say that someone is busy thinking or worrying about something, you mean that it is taking all their attention, often to such an extent that they are unable to think about anything else.

example.ex: Companies are so busy analysing the financial implications that they overlook the effect on workers ...
example.tran: 公司忙于分析此事对财务可能产生的影响，而忽视了其对工人的影响。

example.ex: Most people are too busy with their own troubles to give much help.
example.tran: 大多数人都忙于自己的烦心事，而无暇提供太多的帮助。

entry.def: If you busy yourself with something, you occupy yourself by dealing with it.

example.ex: He busied himself with the camera...
She busied herself getting towels ready...

entry.tran: 热闹的；忙碌的；熙熙攘攘的
entry.def: A busy place is full of people who are doing things or moving about.

example.ex: The Strand is one of London's busiest and most affluent streets...
example.tran: 斯特兰德街是伦敦最繁华、最富足的街道之一。

example.ex: The ward was busy and Amy hardly had time to talk.
example.tran: 病房里非常忙碌，埃米几乎没有时间说话。

entry.def: When a telephone line is busy, you cannot make your call because the line is already being used by someone else.

example.ex: I tried to reach him, but the line was busy.
example.tran: 我试图和他联系，但他的电话占线。

sentences.sentence: "She busies herself with her butterfly collection"

means.word_mean: 1. actively or fully engaged or occupied;
3. intrusive in a meddling or offensive manner;

sentences.sentence: "bustling about self-importantly making an officious nuisance of himself"

means.word_mean: 4. crowdedwith or characterized by much activity;
5. (of facilities such as telephones or lavatories) unavailable for use by anyone else or indicating unavailability; (`engaged' is a British term for a busy telephone line);

auth_sentence.content: He had been too busy dealing with the wounded.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had been too busy dealing with the wounded.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had been too busy dealing with the wounded.

auth_sentence.content: I'm just busy training really hard right now.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm just busy training really hard right now.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm just busy training really hard right now.

auth_sentence.content: I'm too busy THINKING to actually be SLEEPING.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm too busy THINKING to actually be SLEEPING.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm too busy THINKING to actually be SLEEPING.

Sentence.sentence: She was busy finishing her project.
In another firm the workers were constantly complaining about the malfunctioning heating system, but the owners was too busy or too mean to do anything about it.
Oh, yes, that's our busiest time.
Unfortunately,many American universities seem awfully busy protecting their brand name and not nearly busy enough protecting the pursuit of knowledge.
Unfortunately,many American universities seem awfully busy protecting their brand name and not nearly busy enough protecting the pursuit of knowledge.
It would all be innocent enough—20 minutes of busy work—except it comes attached to a personal essay.

sentences.en: He is a very busy man.
No matter how busy he is, he is ready to help others.
sentences.cn: 不管他多忙, 他总是乐意帮助别人。

sentences.en: She is too busy to look after her child.
sentences.cn: 她太忙, 没有时间照料孩子。

sentences.en: She's busy with some important work.
sentences.cn: 她正忙于一些重要工作。

sentences.en: He is busy preparing for the examination.
He telephoned the lawyer and again got a busy signal.
sentences.cn: 他打电话给律师, 但还是听到占线的信号。

jushi.english: He is a very busy man.
He telephoned the lawyer and again got a busy signal.
jushi.chinese: 他给律师打电话,但还是听到占线的信号。
